CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Type__c)='Architects / Engineers / Consultants Factory Visit' , 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Architects Meets', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Boarers Meets' , 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Builders Meets', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Column Dealer / Distributor Meets', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Column DSM Meet / Training', 'Mega',IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Engineers Meets', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Mechanics Factory Visit', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Mega Farmer Meets', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Mega Mechanic Meets', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Mega Plumbers Meets', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Plumbers Factory Visit', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Plumbing Dealer / Distributor Meets', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Plumbing Dealers Factory Visits', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Plumbing DSM Meet/Training', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Projects DSM Meet / Training', 'Mega', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Others', 'Others', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Bombarding', 'Others', IF(TEXT(Type__c)='Group Activity', 'Others', 'Mini') ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ))
CustomField.label: Mega/Mini
